reviewText: A magnificent documentary into the lives and music of these unique manouche musicians. Camera close ups of the guitarist hands working the notes and chords up and down the freeboard are impressive. The philosophical discussions by each of the musicians are true perceptions from the heart and soul. Musicians of any venue the world over could relate to these insights.
If you like gypsy jazz you probably should see this. 4 of the best players on current European scene.
